title: Ozempic & Wegovy Linked to 50% Lower Breast Cancer Risk in New 2025 Study
shortdescription: Blockbuster weight-loss drugs just got even bigger – massive new research drops bombshell benefits.
description: Oxford researchers analyzed 10 years of data and found women on GLP-1 drugs like Ozempic had dramatically reduced breast cancer rates.
author: Health Guru

title: Intermittent Fasting 2025: The 4 New Rules Doctors Say Actually Reverse Aging
shortdescription: Forget 16:8 – the latest science says these tweaks deliver 3x better results.
description: New studies show combining protein pacing, early time-restricted eating, and specific polyphenol timing can slash biological age by up to 7 years.
author: Health Guru

title: Berberine 'Nature’s Ozempic' 2025 Warning: FDA Issues Urgent Alert Over Contaminated Supplements
shortdescription: The viral TikTok weight-loss hack is now linked to liver failure and heavy metal poisoning.
description: Third-party testing found dangerous levels of lead and bacteria in top-selling berberine brands – doctors urge immediate stop.
author: Health Guru
